title: Validate Modified Methods Executor
description: Validates that modified methods don't exceed a maximum line count. Encourages gradual cleanup of legacy long methods.

limit.description: Maximum lines allowed for modified methods

mode.description: OFF: skip validation. NEW_AND_MODIFIED_METHODS: new methods + methods with changes. MODIFIED_FILES: all methods in modified files.

disableAllowed.description: Whether disable comments work. When false, no escape hatch (like old STRICT mode).
